5dd7623ecc98664ed71be1f33ba97a0a98b57e4e.summary: Set what were default values for some emscripten linkflags
5dd7623ecc98664ed71be1f33ba97a0a98b57e4e.body:
- Set `-sSTACK_SIZE` to what it was before emscripten 3.1.27.
It was renamed in 3.1.25 so also set `-sTOTAL_SIZE` for older
versions for consistency.
- Set `-sDEFAULT_PTHREAD_STACK_SIZE` to what it was before 3.1.30.

Co-authored-by: Rémi Verschelde <rverschelde@gmail.com>
(cherry picked from commit 8e5fbd43488ad39a9b987c9abc38134841f44024)

8e5fbd43488ad39a9b987c9abc38134841f44024.body:
- Set `-sSTACK_SIZE` to what it was before emscripten 3.1.27.
It was renamed in 3.1.25 so also set `-sTOTAL_SIZE` for older
versions for consistency.
- Set `-sDEFAULT_PTHREAD_STACK_SIZE` to what it was before 3.1.30.

Co-authored-by: Rémi Verschelde <rverschelde@gmail.com>

51816380b5408d61cb19d932a6cce5b35649834a.summary: Fix memory corruption and assert failures in convex decomposition
51816380b5408d61cb19d932a6cce5b35649834a.body:
This PR fixes how triangular faces are decomposed into vertices and indices. The pre-increment resulted in the indices table skipping entry 0 and potentially overrunning the end of the vertices vector.

cc9bb3bc3f47567e8fcf9dc64097c361c98ffb23.summary: Do not consume (eat) mouse messages with no_focus Window's (Godot PopupMenu)
cc9bb3bc3f47567e8fcf9dc64097c361c98ffb23.body:
Window's with the no_focus flag should still process mouse events and not consume them. Otherwise all mouse pressed operations will not work inside Godot's PopupMenu.
This problem is Windows only, all other platforms do process mouse events for PopupMenu's correctly.

(cherry picked from commit 40d7320a17560222042661798baba150d30c2d91)

40d7320a17560222042661798baba150d30c2d91.summary: Do not consume (eat) mouse messages with no_focus Window's (Godot PopupMenu)
40d7320a17560222042661798baba150d30c2d91.body:
Window's with the no_focus flag should still process mouse events and not consume them. Otherwise all mouse pressed operations will not work inside Godot's PopupMenu.
This problem is Windows only, all other platforms do process mouse events for PopupMenu's correctly.

bd2cad52edbcec37fd47f35ca20a2fe13820e54f.summary: Comment the shader template light function by default
bd2cad52edbcec37fd47f35ca20a2fe13820e54f.body:
This is a minor usability tweak.

The light functions replace the default ones, so even if empty
they will avoid the current shader to have proper lighting and
users will have no idea why.

Code was changed to have the shader function commented by default,
indicating that uncommenting replaces the default function.

(cherry picked from commit c430ff2396d1f7372c88a8ea080ecbf94a43fc9e)

c430ff2396d1f7372c88a8ea080ecbf94a43fc9e.summary: Comment the shader template light function by default
c430ff2396d1f7372c88a8ea080ecbf94a43fc9e.body:
This is a minor usability tweak.

The light functions replace the default ones, so even if empty
they will avoid the current shader to have proper lighting and
users will have no idea why.

Code was changed to have the shader function commented by default,
indicating that uncommenting replaces the default function.

(it uses trilinear filtering by default, like linear mipmap).

- Fix nearest mipmap claiming to always use bilinear filtering
(it uses trilinear filtering by default, like linear mipmap).
